attributes.action: Campaign to the United Nations to deny a Resolution to Decriminalise Sodomy Laws , Unnatural Acts and Homosexuality
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the 17th of May 2007 , Louis George Tin is proposing a resolution to Decriminalise Sodomy Laws , Unnatural Acts and Homosexuality.
Please sign this petition to support the Governments of approxiametly eighty brave Countries , whom continue to honour these laws whom they feel is  for the good of fellow Citizens.
